TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapHeaderAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapHeaderAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapHeaderAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 這個屬性 (Attribute) 會套用至 XML Web Service 方法或 XML Web Service 用戶端，以指定 Web 服務方法或 XML Web Service 用戶端可以處理的 SOAP 標頭。

span.span: This attribute is applied to an XML Web service method or an XML Web service client to specify a SOAP header that the XML Web service method or XML Web service client can process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本步驟來接收和處理 SOAP 標頭會：The basic steps to receiving and processing a SOAP header are: 1. 建立衍生自表示資料傳入的 SOAP 標頭。Create a class deriving from representing the data passed in the SOAP header. 2. 將成員加入至在步驟 1 中建立之類型的 XML Web 服務用戶端 proxy 類別的 XML Web 服務類別。Add a member to the XML Web service class or XML Web service client proxy class of the type created in step 1. 3. 套用，XML Web service 方法或在 proxy 類別中對應的方法，並指定在步驟 2 中建立的成員屬性。Apply a to the XML Web service method or the corresponding method in the proxy class, specifying the member created in step 2 in the property. 4. 在 XML Web 服務方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端程式碼，存取屬性來處理 SOAP 標頭中傳送的資料。Within the XML Web service method or XML Web service client code, access the property to process the data sent in the SOAP header. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more details, see the property. ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web service 會定義一個型別的`MyHeader`。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one of type `MyHeader`. `Hello` XML Web service 方法需要用戶端叫用 XML Web service 方法，與此。The `Hello` XML Web service method requires the client to invoke the XML Web service method with this . `Hello` XML Web 服務也會攔截任何 SOAP 標頭以外`MyHeader`。The `Hello` XML Web service also catches any SOAP headers other than `MyHeader`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string memberName) cil managed

param.name: memberName
param.span: XML Web Service 類別的成員，表示 SOAP 標頭內容。

span.span: The member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.

param.span: 屬性將設為這個參數的值。

span.span: The property will be set to the value of this parameter.

summary.span: 設定表示 SOAP 標頭內容的 XML Web Service 類別的成員，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服務用戶端或 XML Web service，則可以指定想要處理的特定 XML Web 服務方法所套用的 SOAP 標頭XML Web 服務方法之 XML Web 服務類別或 proxy 類別中的對應方法中。An XML Web service client or XML Web service can specify the SOAP headers it wants to process for specific XML Web service methods by applying a to the XML Web service method in the XML Web service class or the corresponding method in the proxy class. 為了讓 XML Web service 方法，以接收 SOAP 標頭的內容，成員加入至 XML Web 服務類別的衍生自。In order for the XML Web service method to receive the contents of the SOAP header, a member is added to the XML Web service class of a derived from . 同樣地，XML Web 服務用戶端會將成員加入衍生自的 proxy 類別。Likewise, an XML Web service client adds a member to the proxy class deriving from . 衍生自表示 SOAP 標頭的內容和 XML Web 服務或想要接收的 SOAP 標頭的 XML Web 服務用戶端的開發人員所建立。That deriving from represents the contents of the SOAP header and is created by the developer of the XML Web service or XML Web service client that wants to receive the SOAP header. 建立類別之後，一旦可以套用至 XML Web service 方法或成員，才能接收 SOAP 標頭的內容與 XML Web 服務用戶端 proxy 類別指定在對應的方法`memberName`這個建構函式參數或屬性。Once the class is created, a can be applied to the XML Web service method or corresponding method in the XML Web service client proxy class specifing the member to receive the SOAP header contents with the `memberName` parameter to this constructor or the property. XML Web 服務方法可以接收多個 SOAP 標頭之 XML Web 服務類別或 XML Web 服務 proxy 類別加入多個成員並接著將套用多個屬性，將 XML Web service 方法。An XML Web service method can receive multiple SOAP headers by adding multiple members to the XML Web service class or the XML Web service proxy class and in turn applying multiple attributes to the XML Web service method. 若要接收和處理未知的 SOAP 標頭寫入 XML Web service 時，指定的成員可以是，或其中一個類別的陣列。To receive and process unknown SOAP headers at the time the XML Web service is written, specify the of the member to be either , or an array of either class. ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web service 會定義一個型別的`MyHeader`。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one of type `MyHeader`. `Hello` XML Web service 方法指定`myHeader`成員接收的內容屬性`MyHeader`傳入 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 標頭。The `Hello` XML Web service method specifies the `myHeader` member as the property to receive the contents of `MyHeader` SOAP headers passed into the XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapHeaderDirection Direction { System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapHeaderDirection get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapHeaderDirection value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 SOAP 標頭，是否要用於 XML Web Service、XML Web Service 用戶端或兩者都是。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the SOAP header is intended for the XML Web service or the XML Web service client or both.

value.span: SOAP 標頭所適用的收件者。

span.span: The intended recipient of the SOAP header.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示所要的收件者即是 XML Web Service。

span.span: The default is , which means the intended recipient is just the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web service 會定義一個型別的`MyHeader`。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one of type `MyHeader`. `Hello` XML Web service 方法指定`MyHeader`XML Web 服務方法和用戶端必須傳送至 invocate XML Web service 方法。The `Hello` XML Web service method specifies that `MyHeader` must be sent to the XML Web service method and the client to invocate the XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MemberName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML Web Service 類別的成員，表示 SOAP 標頭內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.

value.span: XML Web Service 類別的成員，表示 SOAP 標頭內容。

span.span: The member of the XML Web service class representing the SOAP header contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服務或 XML Web 服務用戶端可以指定想要藉由套用所處理的 SOAP 標頭XML Web 服務方法之 XML Web 服務類別或 proxy 類別中的對應方法中。An XML Web service or XML Web service client can specify the SOAP headers it wants to process by applying a to the XML Web service method in the XML Web service class or the corresponding method in the proxy class. 為了讓 XML Web service 方法，以接收 SOAP 標頭的內容，成員加入至衍生類型的 XML Web 服務類別。In order for the XML Web service method to receive the contents of the SOAP header, a member is added to the XML Web service class of a type derived from . 同樣地，XML Web 服務用戶端會將成員加入衍生自的 proxy 類別。Likewise, an XML Web service client adds a member to the proxy class deriving from . 衍生自表示 SOAP 標頭的內容和 XML Web 服務或想要接收的 SOAP 標頭的 XML Web 服務用戶端的開發人員所建立。The deriving from represents the contents of the SOAP header and is created by the developer of the XML Web service or XML Web service client that wants to receive the SOAP header. 建立類別之後，一旦可以套用至 XML Web service 方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端 proxy 類別中指定要接收 SOAP 標頭內容，成員的對應方法屬性。Once the class is created, a can be applied to the XML Web service method or corresponding method in the XML Web service client proxy class specifying the member to receive the SOAP header contents with the property. XML Web 服務方法可以接收多個 SOAP 標頭之 XML Web 服務類別或 XML Web 服務 proxy 類別加入多個成員並接著將套用多個屬性，將 XML Web service 方法。An XML Web service method can receive multiple SOAP headers by adding multiple members to the XML Web service class or the XML Web service proxy class and in turn applying multiple attributes to the XML Web service method. 接收和處理未知的 SOAP 標頭寫入 XML Web service 時，指定為成員的型別，或其中一個類別的陣列。To receive and process unknown SOAP headers at the time the XML Web service is written, specify the type of the member to be either , or an array of either class. ## Examples 下列`MyWebService`XML Web service 會定義一個型別的`MyHeader`。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines one of type `MyHeader`. `Hello` XML Web service 方法指定`myHeader`成員接收的內容屬性`MyHeader`傳入 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 標頭。The `Hello` XML Web service method specifies the `myHeader` member as the property to receive the contents of `MyHeader` SOAP headers passed into the XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Required { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This property will be removed from a future version. The presence of a particular header in a SOAP message is no longer enforced", false)

summary.span: 這個成員已經過時，而且不具功能。

span.span: This member is obsolete and has no functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確認，SOAP 標頭傳送給 XML Web 服務，確認中指定成員屬性是`null`。To verify that a SOAP header is sent to an XML Web service, confirm that the member specified in the property is `null`. 如果是`null`，未傳送的 SOAP 標頭。If it is `null`, the SOAP header was not sent. 在 1.0 版的.NET Framework SDK，屬性會指出必須了解並處理的收件者的 XML Web 服務或 XML Web 服務用戶端的 SOAP 標頭。In version 1.0 of the .NET Framework SDK, the property indicates whether a SOAP header must be understood and processed by the recipient XML Web service or XML Web service client. 如果收件者未處理的 SOAP 標頭已擲回例外狀況。If a recipient did not process the SOAP header an exception was thrown.
